data.price: ئۇلار (يەنى ئاللاھ ياخشى كۆرىدىغان بەندىلەر) خىراجەت قىلغاندا، ئىسراپچىلىقمۇ قىلمايدۇ، بېخىللىقمۇ قىلمايدۇ، ئوتتۇراھال خىراجەت قىلىدۇ[67].
data.arabic: وَٱلَّذِينَ إِذَآ أَنفَقُواْ لَمۡ يُسۡرِفُواْ وَلَمۡ يَقۡتُرُواْ وَكَانَ بَيۡنَ ذَٰلِكَ قَوَامٗا

meta.transliteration: wa-alladhīna idhā anfaqū lam yus'rifū walam yaqturū wakāna bayna dhālika qawāman

dua.name: Dua for Balanced Living
dua.significanceReason: Seeks divine guidance in maintaining balance between spiritual devotion and worldly responsibilities, advocating a moderate lifestyle.

version.title: Uyghur translation - Sh. Muhammad Saleh
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Uyghur by Sh. Muhammad Saleh. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
